title: Shipping
details:
The originals are protected by acid-free tissue paper suitable for preservation. They are shipped in a bubble envelope.
Prints are shipped flat in a cardboard envelope.
All orders are sent by registered mail.
subtitle: Shipping fees
exclusions: Delivery is not available for the following destinations: American Samoa, Christmas Island, Cocos (Keeling) Islands, Cuba, Heard Island and McDonald Islands, Iran, North Korea, Marshall Islands, Micronesia, Norfolk Island, Northern Mariana Islands, Palau, Sudan, Syria, United States Minor Outlying Islands, United States Virgin Islands.
delays: Deliveries are usually made within an average of 7 days in France and rarely exceed 30 days for international shipments (depending on the departure address and the destination of the artwork). Delivery times are provided for reference only, as their adherence depends on the postal service.
